example.text: While returning American citizens detained abroad should always be a top priority, President Biden's exchange of Viktor Bout is shocking. Bout sold weapons to kill Americans, if the United States is going to trade a notorious arms dealer, then every American detained in Russia should be coming home.

I look forward to working with Chairman Sam Graves in the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee to bring about creative funding ideas and innovative programs to invest in our Infrastructure, and with Chairman Bruce Westerman in the Natural Resources committee to protect and preserve Florida's natural resources while working to solve the many crisis our country is facing. FAA Accountability Following the FAA's system meltdown last week, both Chair Graves and I called on and FAA leaders to provide us a full briefing on what went wrong, steps being taken to prevent future occurrences and accountability for the massive disruption cause to Americans across the country.

Thanks to Republican negotiators, this bill is a step in the right direction to provide our military training and resources they need to continue being the world's finest fighting force. A big win in this bill is that it rescinds the COVID-19 vaccine mandate imposed on our service members.

Even President Obama and then Vice President Biden were aware and failed to hold anyone accountable. I have long called for accountability for the actions of corrupt individuals, those that perpetrated this hoax should go to jail.

President Biden continues to show that he has no plan to address the #BidenBorderCrisis. The [[user]]'s Secure the Border Act will finish the wall, strengthen law enforcement on the border, combat illegal immigration and drug trafficking that comes through Mexico.
